block_comment: This block performs register updates in a synchronous manner. It updates two registers, 'ir' and 'jdo', on every positive edge of the clock signal 'clk'. If the condition 'jxuir' is true, it sets the 'ir' register value to 'ir_in'. Similarly, if the 'update_jdo_strobe' is true, it assigns the value of 'sr' to the 'jdo' register.
